channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-8324|2024-09-16T18:44:12.684Z -- lenovo -- lenovoappscenariopluginsystem%20for%20lenovo%20system%20interface%20foundation
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in LenovoAppScenarioPluginSystem for Lenovo System Interface Foundation prior to version 1.2.184.31 that could allow unsigned DLL files to be executed.

item.title: CVE-2019-6166|2024-09-16T17:14:55.601Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow cross-site request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2019-19757|2024-09-16T19:40:04.719Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: An internal product security audit of Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) discovered a Document Object Model (DOM) based cross-site scripting vulnerability in versions prior to 2.6.6 that could allow JavaScript code to be executed in the user's web browser if a specially crafted link is visited. The JavaScript code is executed on the user's system, not executed on LXCA itself.

item.title: CVE-2019-6186|2024-09-16T17:23:01.398Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20system%20interface%20foundation
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Interface Foundation versions before v1.1.18.3 that could allow an authenticated user to execute code as another user.

item.title: CVE-2020-8330|2024-09-16T19:31:27.249Z -- lenovo -- printer%20lj4010dn
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the firmware prior to version 1.01 used in Lenovo Printer LJ4010DN that could be triggered by a remote user sending a crafted packet to the device, preventing subsequent print jobs until the printer is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2019-6167|2024-09-16T17:02:52.749Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Service Bridge before version 4.1.0.1 could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-3417|2024-09-16T16:28:25.678Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20orchestrator
item.description: An internal product security audit of LXCO, prior to version 1.2.2, discovered that credentials for Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA), if added as a Resource Manager, are encoded then written to an internal LXCO log file each time a session is established with LXCA. Affected logs are captured in the First Failure Data Capture (FFDC) service log. The FFDC service log is only generated when requested by a privileged LXCO user and it is only accessible to the privileged LXCO user that requested the file.

item.title: CVE-2023-2290|2024-09-16T14:49:30.904Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the LenovoFlashDeviceInterface SMI handler may allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-8335|2024-09-16T18:04:17.802Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20a285%20bios
item.description: The BIOS tamper detection mechanism was not triggered in Lenovo ThinkPad A285, BIOS versions up to r0xuj70w; A485, BIOS versions up to r0wuj65w; T495 BIOS versions up to r12uj55w; T495s/X395, BIOS versions up to r13uj47w, while the emergency-reset button is pressed which may allow for unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2023-5081|2024-09-16T14:53:54.587Z -- lenovo -- tablet
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Tab M8 HD that could allow a local application to gather a non-resettable device identifier.

item.title: CVE-2023-5078|2024-09-16T14:52:18.065Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20bios
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some ThinkPad BIOS that could allow a physical or local attacker with elevated privileges to tamper with BIOS firmware.

item.title: CVE-2023-5080|2024-09-16T14:53:27.329Z -- lenovo -- tablet
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo tablet products that could allow local applications access to device identifiers and system commands.

item.title: CVE-2020-8337|2024-09-16T18:38:25.028Z -- lenovo -- synaptics%20smart%20audio%20uwp%20app
item.description: An unquoted search path vulnerability was reported in versions prior to 1.0.83.0 of the Synaptics Smart Audio UWP app associated with the DCHU audio drivers on Lenovo platforms that could allow an administrative user to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2020-8336|2024-09-16T19:56:08.433Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: Lenovo implemented Intel CSME Anti-rollback ARB protections on some ThinkPad models to prevent roll back of CSME Firmware in flash.

item.title: CVE-2020-8320|2024-09-16T17:33:07.639Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: An internal shell was included in BIOS image in some ThinkPad models that could allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2020-8333|2024-09-16T17:38:49.850Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the EEPROM driver in some Lenovo Desktops and ThinkStation models may allow arbitrary code execution

item.title: CVE-2019-6183|2024-09-16T18:50:15.393Z -- lenovo -- energy%20management%20driver
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability has been reported in Lenovo Energy Management Driver for Windows 10 versions prior to 15.11.29.7 that could cause systems to experience a blue screen error. Lenovo Energy Management is a client utility. Lenovo XClarity Energy Manager is not affected.

item.title: CVE-2020-8316|2024-09-16T18:43:36.192Z -- lenovo -- vantage
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Vantage prior to version 10.2003.10.0 that could allow an authenticated user to read files on the system with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-19756|2024-09-16T16:32:57.281Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: An internal product security audit of Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) discovered Windows OS credentials, used to perform driver updates of managed systems, being written to a log file in clear text. This only affects LXCA version 2.6.0 when performing a Windows driver update. Affected logs are only accessible to authorized users in the First Failure Data Capture (FFDC) service log and log files on LXCA.

item.title: CVE-2020-8319|2024-09-16T17:27:40.189Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20system%20interface%20foundation
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo System Interface Foundation prior to version 1.1.19.3 that could allow an authenticated user to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-6191|2024-09-16T18:14:09.440Z -- lenovo -- lenovopaper
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the discontinued LenovoPaper software version 1.0.0.22 may allow local privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2019-6158|2024-09-16T16:53:25.613Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: An internal product security audit of Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA) discovered HTTP proxy credentials being written to a log file in clear text. This only affects LXCA when HTTP proxy credentials have been configured. This affects LXCA versions 2.0.0 to 2.3.x.

item.title: CVE-2019-6195|2024-09-16T16:14:10.788Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller%20%28xcc%29
item.description: An authorization bypass exists in Lenovo XClarity Controller (XCC) versions prior to 3.08 CDI340V, 3.01 TEI392O, 1.71 PSI328N where a valid authenticated user with lesser privileges may be granted read-only access to higher-privileged information if 1) “LDAP Authentication Only with Local Authorization” mode is configured and used by XCC, and 2) a lesser privileged user logs into XCC within 1 minute of a higher privileged user logging out. The authorization bypass does not exist when “Local Authentication and Authorization” or “LDAP Authentication and Authorization” modes are configured and used by XCC.

item.title: CVE-2023-2992|2024-09-16T14:51:34.588Z -- lenovo -- system%20management%20module%20%28smm%29
item.description: An unauthenticated denial of service vulnerability exists in the SMM v1, SMM v2, and FPC management web server which can be triggered under crafted conditions. Rebooting SMM or FPC will restore access to the management web server.

item.title: CVE-2019-6177|2024-09-16T18:59:18.570Z -- lenovo -- solution%20center
item.description: A vulnerability reported in Lenovo Solution Center version 03.12.003, which is no longer supported, could allow log files to be written to non-standard locations, potentially leading to privilege escalation. Lenovo ended support for Lenovo Solution Center and recommended that customers migrate to Lenovo Vantage or Lenovo Diagnostics in April 2018.

item.title: CVE-2019-6173|2024-09-16T17:54:54.225Z -- lenovo -- installation%20packages
item.description: A DLL search path vulnerability could allow privilege escalation in some Lenovo installation packages, prior to version 1.2.9.3, during installation if an attacker already has administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-19758|2024-09-16T16:23:29.531Z -- lenovo -- ez%20media%20%26%20backup%20center%20ix2
item.description: A vulnerability in the web interface of Lenovo EZ Media & Backup Center, ix2 & ix2-dl version 4.1.406.34763 and prior could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to redirect a user to an untrusted web page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4550|2024-09-16T17:59:31.539Z -- lenovo -- p360%20workstation%20%28thinkstation%29%20bios
item.description: A potential buffer overflow vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo ThinkSystem and ThinkStation products that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-7756|2024-09-16T17:51:12.837Z -- lenovo -- 10w%20%28type%2082st%2C%2082su%29%20laptop%20%28lenovo%29%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the ThinkPad L390 Yoga and 10w Notebook that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges by accessing an embedded UEFI shell.

item.title: CVE-2024-45105|2024-09-16T17:38:38.871Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20bios
item.description: An internal product security audit discovered a UEFI SMM (System Management Mode) callout vulnerability in some ThinkSystem servers that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-8280|2024-09-13T21:01:59.322Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: An input validation weakness was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection or cause a recoverable denial of service using a specially crafted file.

item.title: CVE-2024-8278|2024-09-13T21:02:31.667Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-8279|2024-09-13T21:02:15.683Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-45104|2024-09-13T17:48:48.901Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user without sufficient privileges may be able to use the device identifier to modify an LXCA managed device through a specially crafted web API call.

item.title: CVE-2024-8280|2024-09-13T17:27:39.022Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: An input validation weakness was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection or cause a recoverable denial of service using a specially crafted file.

item.title: CVE-2024-4550|2024-09-13T17:26:46.819Z -- lenovo -- p360%20workstation%20%28thinkstation%29%20bios
item.description: A potential buffer overflow vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo ThinkSystem and ThinkStation products that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-7756|2024-09-13T17:26:58.798Z -- lenovo -- 10w%20%28type%2082st%2C%2082su%29%20laptop%20%28lenovo%29%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the ThinkPad L390 Yoga and 10w Notebook that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges by accessing an embedded UEFI shell.

item.title: CVE-2024-8278|2024-09-13T17:27:19.968Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-45103|2024-09-13T17:49:12.258Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A valid, authenticated LXCA user may be able to unmanage an LXCA managed device in through the LXCA web interface without sufficient privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-8279|2024-09-13T17:27:30.967Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-45105|2024-09-13T17:29:08.267Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20bios
item.description: An internal product security audit discovered a UEFI SMM (System Management Mode) callout vulnerability in some ThinkSystem servers that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-8059|2024-09-13T17:55:08.750Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: IPMI credentials may be captured in XCC audit log entries when the account username length is 16 characters.

item.title: CVE-2024-3100|2024-09-13T17:26:33.357Z -- lenovo -- 100w%20gen%203%20laptop%20%28lenovo%29%20bios
item.description: A potential buffer overflow vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Notebook products that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-45101|2024-09-13T17:50:38.901Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20administrator
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered when Single Sign On (SSO) is enabled that could allow an attacker to intercept a valid, authenticated LXCA user’s XCC session if they can convince the user to click on a specially crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2024-8281|2024-09-13T17:27:48.442Z -- lenovo -- hx5530%20appliance%20%28thinkagile%29%20xcc
item.description: An input validation weakness was discovered in XCC that could allow a valid, authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection through specially crafted command line input in the XCC SSH captive shell.

item.title: CVE-2024-3286|2024-09-06T22:55:43.149Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was identified in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated user to trigger a device restart by sending a specially crafted web request.

item.title: CVE-2024-23594|2024-09-06T22:07:46.396Z -- lenovo -- windows%207%20and%208%20pc%20preloads
item.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability was reported
in a system recovery bootloader that was part of the Lenovo preloaded Windows 7 and 8 operating systems from 2012 to 2014
that could allow a privileged attacker with local access to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-23592|2024-09-06T20:09:15.535Z -- lenovo -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20readers
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was reported in Lenovo devices with Synaptics fingerprint readers that could allow an attacker with physical access to replay fingerprints and bypass Windows Hello authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-8105|2024-08-30T20:50:54.875Z -- lenovo -- lenovo-10w-type-82st-82su
item.description: A vulnerability related to the use an insecure Platform Key (PK) has been discovered. An attacker with the compromised PK private key can create malicious UEFI software that is signed with a trusted key that has been compromised.

item.title: CVE-2024-8105|2024-08-26T19:32:40.911Z -- lenovo -- lenovo-10w-type-82st-82su
item.description: A vulnerability related to the use an insecure Platform Key (PK) has been discovered. An attacker with the compromised PK private key can create malicious UEFI software that is signed with a trusted key that has been compromised.

item.title: CVE-2024-27910|2024-08-20T15:40:35.116Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to reboot the printer without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-6004|2024-08-16T16:43:07.650Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to deny printer connections until the system is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2024-5210|2024-08-16T14:17:39.051Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to prevent printer services from being reachable until the system is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2024-2175|2024-08-16T14:17:03.626Z -- lenovo -- display%20control%20center
item.description:
An insecure permissions vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Display Control Center (LDCC) and Lenovo Accessories and Display Manager (LADM)
that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-4763|2024-08-16T14:17:13.323Z -- lenovo -- display%20control%20center
item.description:
An insecure driver vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Display Control Center (LDCC) and Lenovo Accessories and Display Manager (LADM)
that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges to kernel.

item.title: CVE-2024-4782|2024-08-16T14:17:24.013Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to disrupt the printer's functionality until a manual system reboot occurs.

item.title: CVE-2024-4781|2024-08-16T14:17:18.955Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to crash printer communications until the system is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2024-6004|2024-08-16T14:17:44.070Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to deny printer connections until the system is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2024-5209|2024-08-16T14:39:56.977Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker on a shared network to deny printing capabilities until the system is rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2019-6198|2024-08-02T18:11:26.320Z -- lenovo -- pc%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PC Manager prior to version 2.8.90.11211 that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-5912|2024-08-02T08:14:24.668Z -- lenovo -- notebook%20bios
item.description: A potential memory leakage vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Notebook products that may allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to write to NVRAM variables.

item.title: CVE-2024-38509|2024-08-02T04:12:24.979Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted IPMI command.

item.title: CVE-2024-38512|2024-08-02T04:12:25.173Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-38511|2024-08-02T04:12:25.141Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in an upload processing functionality of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38510|2024-08-02T04:12:24.688Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the SSH captive command shell interface that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38508|2024-08-02T04:12:25.569Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the web interface or SSH captive command shell interface of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2024-4696|2024-08-01T20:47:41.519Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Service Bridge prior to version 5.0.2.17 that could allow operating system commands to be executed if a specially crafted link is visited.

item.title: CVE-2024-3286|2024-08-01T20:05:08.381Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was identified in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated user to trigger a device restart by sending a specially crafted web request.

item.title: CVE-2024-4786|2024-08-01T20:55:08.718Z -- lenovo -- tab%20k10
item.description: An improper validation vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Tab K10 that could allow a specially crafted application to keep the device on.

item.title: CVE-2017-3772|2024-08-01T15:04:36.566Z -- lenovo -- pc%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PC Manager versions prior to 2.6.40.3154 that could allow an attacker to cause a system reboot.

item.title: CVE-2023-25493|2024-07-31T19:31:26.044Z -- lenovo -- bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-38509|2024-07-27T17:21:01.331Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted IPMI command.

item.title: CVE-2024-38512|2024-07-27T17:16:58.109Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted IPMI commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-38511|2024-07-27T17:19:56.955Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in an upload processing functionality of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38510|2024-07-27T17:20:24.112Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the SSH captive command shell interface that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via specially crafted file uploads.

item.title: CVE-2024-38508|2024-07-27T17:21:36.848Z -- lenovo -- xclarity%20controller
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in the web interface or SSH captive command shell interface of XCC that could allow an authenticated XCC user with elevated privileges to perform command injection via a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2023-4855|2024-07-09T20:00:42.214Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user with elevated privileges to execute unauthorized commands via IPMI.

item.title: CVE-2023-4857|2024-07-09T19:59:02.276Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user to execute certain IPMI calls that could lead to exposure of limited system information.

item.title: CVE-2023-4856|2024-07-09T17:42:49.691Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A format string vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary commands on a specific API endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2024-27911|2024-06-20T15:59:08.416Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the administrator password.

item.title: CVE-2024-27912|2024-06-20T15:57:13.662Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an attacker to cause the device to crash by sending crafted LPD packets.

item.title: CVE-2024-27909|2024-06-20T15:47:17.193Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the HTTPS service of some Lenovo Printers that could result in a system reboot.

item.title: CVE-2024-4696|2024-06-13T20:01:18.145Z -- lenovo -- service%20bridge
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Service Bridge prior to version 5.0.2.17 that could allow operating system commands to be executed if a specially crafted link is visited.

item.title: CVE-2024-2659|2024-04-15T18:00:12.275Z -- lenovo -- smm%2C%20smm2%2C%20fpc
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was identified in SMM/SMM2 and FPC that could allow an authenticated user with elevated privileges to execute system commands when performing a specific administrative function.

item.title: CVE-2024-3286|2024-05-16T17:21:21.869Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability was identified in some Lenovo printers that could allow an unauthenticated user to trigger a device restart by sending a specially crafted web request.

item.title: CVE-2024-23593|2024-06-04T17:45:57.103Z -- lenovo -- windows%207%20and%208%20pc%20preloads
item.description:
A vulnerability was reported
in a system recovery bootloader that was part of the Lenovo preloaded Windows 7 and 8 operating systems from 2012 to 2014
that could allow a privileged attacker with local access to modify the boot manager and escalate privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-23592|2024-04-05T20:46:20.996Z -- lenovo -- synaptics%20fingerprint%20readers
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability was reported in Lenovo devices with Synaptics fingerprint readers that could allow an attacker with physical access to replay fingerprints and bypass Windows Hello authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-23594|2024-04-15T18:01:23.230Z -- lenovo -- windows%207%20and%208%20pc%20preloads
item.description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability was reported
in a system recovery bootloader that was part of the Lenovo preloaded Windows 7 and 8 operating systems from 2012 to 2014
that could allow a privileged attacker with local access to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-27911|2024-04-05T20:47:01.657Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to obtain the administrator password.

item.title: CVE-2024-27910|2024-04-05T20:46:55.352Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in some Lenovo Printers that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to reboot the printer without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-27909|2024-04-05T20:46:46.021Z -- lenovo -- printers
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability was reported in the HTTPS service of some Lenovo Printers that could result in a system reboot.

item.description: A potential vulnerability was reported in the BIOS update tool driver for some Desktop, Smart Edge, Smart Office, and ThinkStation products that could allow a local user with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
